00053 class CUDT;
00054 
00055 class CUDTSocket
00056 {
00057 public:
00058    CUDTSocket();
00059    ~CUDTSocket();
00060 
00061    UDTSTATUS m_Status;                       // current socket state
00062 
00063    uint64_t m_TimeStamp;                     // time when the socket is closed
00064 
00065    int m_iIPversion;                         // IP version
00066    sockaddr* m_pSelfAddr;                    // pointer to the local address of the socket
00067    sockaddr* m_pPeerAddr;                    // pointer to the peer address of the socket
00068 
00069    UDTSOCKET m_SocketID;                     // socket ID
00070    UDTSOCKET m_ListenSocket;                 // ID of the listener socket; 0 means this is an independent socket
00071 
00072    UDTSOCKET m_PeerID;                       // peer socket ID
00073    int32_t m_iISN;                           // initial sequence number, used to tell different connection from same IP:port
00074 
00075    CUDT* m_pUDT;                             // pointer to the UDT entity
00076 
00077    std::set<UDTSOCKET>* m_pQueuedSockets;    // set of connections waiting for accept()
00078    std::set<UDTSOCKET>* m_pAcceptSockets;    // set of accept()ed connections
00079 
00080    pthread_cond_t m_AcceptCond;              // used to block "accept" call
00081    pthread_mutex_t m_AcceptLock;             // mutex associated to m_AcceptCond
00082 
00083    unsigned int m_uiBackLog;                 // maximum number of connections in queue
00084 
00085    int m_iMuxID;                             // multiplexer ID
00086 
00087 private:
00088    CUDTSocket(const CUDTSocket&);
00089    CUDTSocket& operator=(const CUDTSocket&);
00090 };

00094 class CUDTUnited
00095 {
00096 friend class CUDT;
00097 
00098 public:
00099    CUDTUnited();
00100    ~CUDTUnited();
00101 
00102 public:
00103 
00104       // Functionality:
00105       //    initialize the UDT library.
00106       // Parameters:
00107       //    None.
00108       // Returned value:
00109       //    0 if success, otherwise -1 is returned.
00110 
00111    int startup();
00112 
00113       // Functionality:
00114       //    release the UDT library.
00115       // Parameters:
00116       //    None.
00117       // Returned value:
00118       //    0 if success, otherwise -1 is returned.
00119 
00120    int cleanup();
00121 
00122       // Functionality:
00123       //    Create a new UDT socket.
00124       // Parameters:
00125       //    0) [in] af: IP version, IPv4 (AF_INET) or IPv6 (AF_INET6).
00126       //    1) [in] type: socket type, SOCK_STREAM or SOCK_DGRAM
00127       // Returned value:
00128       //    The new UDT socket ID, or INVALID_SOCK.
00129 
00130    UDTSOCKET newSocket(const int& af, const int& type);
00131 
00132       // Functionality:
00133       //    Create a new UDT connection.
00134       // Parameters:
00135       //    0) [in] listen: the listening UDT socket;
00136       //    1) [in] peer: peer address.
00137       //    2) [in/out] hs: handshake information from peer side (in), negotiated value (out);
00138       // Returned value:
00139       //    If the new connection is successfully created: 1 success, 0 already exist, -1 error.
00140 
00141    int newConnection(const UDTSOCKET listen, const sockaddr* peer, CHandShake* hs);
00142 
00143       // Functionality:
00144       //    look up the UDT entity according to its ID.
00145       // Parameters:
00146       //    0) [in] u: the UDT socket ID.
00147       // Returned value:
00148       //    Pointer to the UDT entity.
00149 
00150    CUDT* lookup(const UDTSOCKET u);
00151 
00152       // Functionality:
00153       //    Check the status of the UDT socket.
00154       // Parameters:
00155       //    0) [in] u: the UDT socket ID.
00156       // Returned value:
00157       //    UDT socket status, or NONEXIST if not found.
00158 
00159    UDTSTATUS getStatus(const UDTSOCKET u);
00160 
00161       // socket APIs
00162 
00163    int bind(const UDTSOCKET u, const sockaddr* name, const int& namelen);
00164    int bind(const UDTSOCKET u, UDPSOCKET udpsock);
00165    int listen(const UDTSOCKET u, const int& backlog);
00166    UDTSOCKET accept(const UDTSOCKET listen, sockaddr* addr, int* addrlen);
00167    int connect(const UDTSOCKET u, const sockaddr* name, const int& namelen);
00168    int close(const UDTSOCKET u);
00169    int getpeername(const UDTSOCKET u, sockaddr* name, int* namelen);
00170    int getsockname(const UDTSOCKET u, sockaddr* name, int* namelen);
00171    int select(ud_set* readfds, ud_set* writefds, ud_set* exceptfds, const timeval* timeout);
00172    int selectEx(const std::vector<UDTSOCKET>& fds, std::vector<UDTSOCKET>* readfds, std::vector<UDTSOCKET>* writefds, std::vector<UDTSOCKET>* exceptfds, int64_t msTimeOut);
00173    int epoll_create();
00174    int epoll_add_usock(const int eid, const UDTSOCKET u, const int* events = NULL);
00175    int epoll_add_ssock(const int eid, const SYSSOCKET s, const int* events = NULL);
00176    int epoll_remove_usock(const int eid, const UDTSOCKET u, const int* events = NULL);
00177    int epoll_remove_ssock(const int eid, const SYSSOCKET s, const int* events = NULL);
00178    int epoll_wait(const int eid, std::set<UDTSOCKET>* readfds, std::set<UDTSOCKET>* writefds, int64_t msTimeOut, std::set<SYSSOCKET>* lrfds = NULL, std::set<SYSSOCKET>* lwfds = NULL);
00179    int epoll_release(const int eid);
00180 
00181       // Functionality:
00182       //    record the UDT exception.
00183       // Parameters:
00184       //    0) [in] e: pointer to a UDT exception instance.
00185       // Returned value:
00186       //    None.
00187 
00188    void setError(CUDTException* e);
00189 
00190       // Functionality:
00191       //    look up the most recent UDT exception.
00192       // Parameters:
00193       //    None.
00194       // Returned value:
00195       //    pointer to a UDT exception instance.
00196 
00197    CUDTException* getError();
00198 
00199 private:
00200    std::map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*> m_Sockets;       // stores all the socket structures
00201 
00202    pthread_mutex_t m_ControlLock;                    // used to synchronize UDT API
00203 
00204    pthread_mutex_t m_IDLock;                         // used to synchronize ID generation
00205    UDTSOCKET m_SocketID;                             // seed to generate a new unique socket ID
00206 
00207    std::map<int64_t, std::set<UDTSOCKET> > m_PeerRec;// record sockets from peers to avoid repeated connection request, int64_t = (socker_id << 30) + isn
00208 
00209 private:
00210    pthread_key_t m_TLSError;                         // thread local error record (last error)
00211    #ifndef WIN32
00212       static void TLSDestroy(void* e) {if (NULL != e) delete (CUDTException*)e;}
00213    #else
00214       std::map<DWORD, CUDTException*> m_mTLSRecord;
00215       void checkTLSValue();
00216       pthread_mutex_t m_TLSLock;
00217    #endif
00218 
00219 private:
00220    CUDTSocket* locate(const UDTSOCKET u);
00221    CUDTSocket* locate(const sockaddr* peer, const UDTSOCKET& id, const int32_t& isn);
00222    void updateMux(CUDTSocket* s, const sockaddr* addr = NULL, const UDPSOCKET* = NULL);
00223    void updateMux(CUDTSocket* s, const CUDTSocket* ls);
00224 
00225 private:
00226    std::map<int, CMultiplexer> m_mMultiplexer;          // UDP multiplexer
00227    pthread_mutex_t m_MultiplexerLock;
00228 
00229 private:
00230    CCache* m_pCache;                                    // UDT network information cache
00231 
00232 private:
00233    volatile bool m_bClosing;
00234    pthread_mutex_t m_GCStopLock;
00235    pthread_cond_t m_GCStopCond;
00236 
00237    pthread_mutex_t m_InitLock;
00238    int m_iInstanceCount;                                // number of startup() called by application
00239    bool m_bGCStatus;                                    // if the GC thread is working (true)
00240 
00241    pthread_t m_GCThread;
00242    #ifndef WIN32
00243       static void* garbageCollect(void*);
00244    #else
00245       static DWORD WINAPI garbageCollect(LPVOID);
00246    #endif
00247 
00248    std::map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*> m_ClosedSockets;   // temporarily store closed sockets
00249 
00250    void checkBrokenSockets();
00251    void removeSocket(const UDTSOCKET u);
00252 
00253 private:
00254    CEPoll m_EPoll;                                     // handling epoll data structures and events
00255 
00256 private:
00257    CUDTUnited(const CUDTUnited&);
00258    CUDTUnited& operator=(const CUDTUnited&);
00259 };
